short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that saves open tabs so you don't lose them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save the currently open tabs in your Chrome window and prevent potential loss or the necessity to dig through your browsing history, and
reopen the window as it is in its current state and at any time.
